mapper.select: select id, to_char(created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, to_char(modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, correction_shop_product_id, status, section, practice_type, practice_name, book, product_type, product_limit_date, product_qty from correction_shop_product_detail a where correction_shop_product_id = #{correction_shop_product_id} order by id
mapper.insert: insert into correction_shop_product_detail( created, modified, correction_shop_product_id, status, section, practice_type, practice_name, book, product_type, product_limit_date, product_qty )values( now(), now(), #{correction_shop_product_id}, #{status}, #{section}, #{practice_type}, #{practice_name}, #{book}, #{product_type}, #{product_limit_date}, #{product_qty} )
